description:
exp/norm: fixes a subtle bug introduced by change 10087: random offset
for map iteration.  New code makes table output predictable and fixes
bug.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=802d4c3a4254 ***

exp/norm: fixes a subtle bug introduced by change 10087: random offset
for map iteration.  New code makes table output predictable and fixes
bug.

R=rsc, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5573044

subject: code review 5573044: exp/norm: fixes a subtle bug introduced by change 10087...
